entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
